long_description: Two hats in one, the REI Reversible bucket hat lets you choose the look that suits your style for the day. Titanium-colored exterior is lined with a teal-colored blend of cotton and nylon; flip the hat inside out to change up the look. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays.
short_description: Two hats in one, the REI Reversible bucket hat lets you choose the look that suits your style for the day.
